entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
